reviews.text: This hotel is close to the San Jose Airport and the Dumbarton Bridge, so it's very convenient to get around, but it's far enough away from the freeway to not have the noise.
reviews.title: Quiet hotel, well located

reviews.text: All the usual HI Express stuff is here: showerhead, curved shower rod, cinnamon rolls; the staff is up to snuff.
reviews.title: A nice place to stay for the money

reviews.text: The hotel was full during my stay and the only room left was a suite. It's fairly large, and the living room is well separated from the bedroom. The living room features a small wet bar, microwave, coffee maker, and mini-fridge as well as a TV, sofa, and some tables. There's also a skylight in this part of the room.
reviews.title: Not too Bad.

reviews.text: The bedroom area has another TV and a desk. There is both wired and wireless internet available. The wireless was sometimes congested, but the wired internet was always fast.
reviews.title: Okay stay despite poor staff service and rundown building
Great location, espically if you drive
